overview: Model Ball is the serialized story of Jake McBride, "The best softball player in his league," who bets his best friend he can win the league with a team of models. Together, Jake and his model cousin Holly recruit an athletic group of pampered princesses and attempt to turn them into a well-oiled softball playing machine.
tagline: Can a group of gorgeous women compete in a beer softball league without breaking a nail?
title: The Girls of Summer
